feed.title: Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Cartwright Junction (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: No watches or warnings in effect.

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 16.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending early this afternoon then cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill minus 25 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clearing this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 23 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Increasing cloudiness. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 17 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023
